definition: horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: Caesar Salad with Garlic Croutons, Bacon, Quail Eggs and White Anchovies.
sentences.chinese: 凱撒沙律配蒜香麪包幹，培根，鵪鶉蛋伴白鳳尾魚。

sentences.english: Packed close together, no one anchovy stands out.
sentences.chinese: 緊緊地團在一起，沒有一條鳳尾魚落單。

sentences.english: Imagine you had a favorite food – like, say, well, anchovies.
sentences.chinese: 想象一下，你有一種最愛喫的食物，比如說，鳳尾魚。

sentences.english: Life as we know it has just come to an abrupt and cruel end.
sentences.chinese: 而且我定了匹薩，沒有鳳尾魚，只是你喜歡的那樣。

sentences.english: The anchovy lives in salt water and is rarely found in fresh water.
sentences.chinese: 鳳尾魚生活在鹹水裏，淡水裏很少見。

sentences.english: Bnchovies are one of those things that you either love or hate.
sentences.chinese: 鳳尾魚是你既不愛又不恨的東西之一。

sentences.english: A little anchovy sauce is added.
The anchovy fisheries will stay closed, by EU order.
sentences.chinese: 根據歐盟的規定，鳳尾魚漁場將依然關閉。
